item.description: Upcoming Events Python Workshop Series - Intermediate 📍 E:1406 Ole Römers väg 3, 223 63 Lund 📅 April 26 & May 3 17:30 🔗 Facebook event Have you ever considered learning how to code and harness AI’s power? Well, this is your chance to achieve that through our workshop series on Python - the most versatile and hottest programming language of 2023! In this intermediate level series of workshops, we are going to cover Supervised and Unsupervised Learning as well as Machine Learning Pipeline.

Get active in the Hub! We offer free membership for all students at Lund University. Register here. You can also get active in the committee team, shape the future of Hub AI, expand your network, and develop professional and soft skills! Hub AI is growing and wants you on board for this exciting journey! Read more and apply here.
